data.title: Find My Assigned School
data.meta_description: School locator app to find your Broward County Public Schools (BCPS) assigned boundary school.
data.text:
Please enter your child's home address and city. If your street name is a number, enter the suffix (for example: 1st, 2nd, 3rd, 4th).

Address not found? â€“ Email your full address to boundaries@browardschools.com. The Demographics & Enrollment Planning Department will look up your address and reply to your email.
